input.sentences: the hike to mulberry was such a bad idea .
we kept walking and all we saw was dry bush .
the deeper in the bush we walked | the later it got
finally we came to a clearing that showed a path .
the birds chirped overhead signaling our good luck .
output.sentences: The morning sun begins to creep over mountains.
I begin my day's hike by picking my way through the brush.
Reaching the edge of the brush, I get the first glimpse of my destination, the forest.
Under the canopy is a cooling shade that provides relief from the heat of the day.
I rest for a while, listening to the sweet songs of the birds.
